title: Burst! the Actor Was Won By the Newcomer - Novel Updates
genre: Romance   Sci-fi   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Acting   Calm Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Cohabitation   Comedic Undertone   Couple Growth   Doting Love Interests   Eidetic Memory   First Love   Friendship   Game Ranking System   Handsome Male Lead   Loneliness   Modern Day   Movies   Overpowered Protagonist   Popular Love Interests   Power Couple   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Returning from Another World   Roommates   Showbiz   Smart Couple   Strong Love Interests   Survival Game   System Administrator   Teamwork   Time Travel   Transmigration   Wealthy Characters   World Hopping
author: 火鸟啾啾
description:
Fang Zhi saved 100,000 points and finally returned to his original world, only to find that fifty years had passed.

The body is made by the system, and the identity is made by the system. No relatives and friends, no past, and… no money.

To eat, “Three No's” Fang Zhi took his acting skills honed from ninety-nine worlds into the audition scene.

When filling out the registration form, the reporter asked him what his goal was. The handsome young man in front of the camera turned his pen lazily, his tone was lazy and casual.

“Target? Take down the actor first.”

Reporter: ...

Camera: …

Other actors around: …

In front of the screen, Lin Yingdi, who is watching the live broadcast: …

Who won?>
